des: "This is the yummiest red curry paste we have had and have made it many times; we also incorporate it into other recipes such as rissoles or fried rice."
ins: Blend chile peppers, cilantro, onion, garlic, coriander, and turmeric together in a blender until smooth. Add tomato paste, vegetable oil, fish sauce, and soy sauce; blend until smooth, scraping down the sides of the blender with a spatula as needed.
